testcase.failure:
Given I have navigated to "India" site......................................passed And I scroll to the footer section at the bottom............................failed When I click on the footer "Banking & Financial Services" link..............skipped Then the loaded page URL is "https://www.cognizant.com/banking-financial-technology-solutions".skipped
